ro.already_paired: This device has already been paired.
ro.autostart_after_message: Automatically start the bridge service, in seconds.
ro.certification_benefits: Another benefit to using certified plugins is, HOOBS support. Since HOOBS tests certified plugins, we are familiar with the plugin and can help troubleshoot issues. And in the event where the plugins is broke, we can work with the plugin developer on your behalf to help address the issue.
ro.certification_program: The HOOBS certification program helps promote plugins that work. We work with the plugin developer to address issues, and help keep the plugins simple and easy to configure.
ro.config_reboot_confirm: You need to reboot for these changes to take effect.
ro.confirm_action: Are you sure you want to continue?
ro.confirm_exit: Are you sure you want to leave?
ro.confirm_factory_reset: Are you sure you want to reset this device?
ro.confirm_reboot: Are you sure you want to reboot this device?
ro.confirm_refresh: Are you sure you want to refresh?
ro.confirm_remove: Are you sure you want to remove this device?
ro.confirm_restart: Are you sure you want to restart the bridge?
ro.country_code_message: Setați codul de țară unde acest dispozitiv este. Acest lucru este utilizat pentru prognozele meteo
ro.device_address: Enter the IP address your HOOBS device
ro.device_hostname: Assign a name for this device
ro.end_port_invalid: Portul nu este valid. Trebuie sa fie o cifra intre 1 si 65535.
ro.factory_reset_message: This will remove all plugins, configurations and settings.
ro.generate_new_username: Genera»õi un nou nume de utilizator
ro.help_welcome: HOOBS is an ecosystem that aims to unify and simplfy the "Smart Home". We beilive that you should be able to use the devices you want, and not be locked into one provider's solution. If you want to use Google Home for your voice control and Apple Home for your routines, go ahead, HOOBS will make tht happen for you. HOOBS can connect your devices togeather by the use of plugins. HOOBS has "Certified Plugins", and it supports Homebridge plugins. This means you have over 1,000 choices when it comes to your Smart Home tech.
ro.home_pin_message: PIN-ul utilizat atunci cand se afauga Homebridge in Apple Home.
ro.home_username_message: Numele de utilizator pe care  Apple Home il foloseste pentru a identifica Homebridge.
ro.homekit_disconnect: Acest lucru se va deconecta de la Apple Homebridge Acasă. Va trebui să re-pereche.
ro.hoobs_unavailable: HOOBS is not available on this device.
ro.invalid_mac_address: This device doesn't have a valid MAC address.
ro.invalid_port_range: Plaja de porturi nu este valida. Numarul de port final trebuie sa fie mai mare decat numarul portului de pornire.
ro.language_message: Setati limba interfetei sau setati-o pe auto pentru a utiliza limba browserului.
ro.latitude_message: Set the latitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
ro.longitude_message: Set the longitude to where this device is. This is used for weather forecasts
ro.name: Nume
ro.plugin_select_device: Select a device to install this plugin.
ro.polling_seconds_invalid: Refresh interval is invalid. It must be an integer between 1 second and 30 minutes.
ro.polling_seconds_message: Refresh the accessory states interval in seconds.
ro.postal_code_message: Setați codul poștal în cazul în care la acest aparat este. Acest lucru este utilizat pentru prognozele meteo
ro.range_name_message: O descriere a plajei de porturi pentru a putea fi identificata.
ro.server_port_invalid: Server port is invalid. It must be a number between 1 and 65535.
ro.server_port_message: Set the main port the server runs on.
ro.service_description_message: Folosit impreuna cu numele pentru a putea identifica mai usor Homebridge in sistem.
ro.service_name_message: Folosit pentru a identifica serviciul Homebridge in sistem.
ro.service_port_invalid: Portul serviciului nu este valid. Trebuie sa fie un numar intre 1 si 65535.
ro.service_port_message: Portul pe care functioneaza Homebridge, implicit este 51826.
ro.start_port_invalid: Portul de pornire nu este valid. Trebuie sa fie un numar intre 1 si 65535.
ro.start_port_message: Numarul de pornire al plajei de porturi.
ro.temp_units_message: Setați unitățile pe care doriți senzori temprature pentru a afișa.
ro.time_format_message: This only affects times in the interface.
